item.title: Oldest dog in rescue gets special party for his 23rd birthday — happy birthday, Bully
item.dc:creator: simra
item.description:
AuthorPOSTED BYadmin PUBLISHEDJanuary 24, 20233:29 pm UPDATED6:13 pm Bully was taken in by a senior...

The post Oldest dog in rescue gets special party for his 23rd birthday — happy birthday, Bully appeared first on News.
item.content:encoded:
• AuthorPOSTED BYadmin
  • PUBLISHEDJanuary 24, 20233:29 pm
  • UPDATED6:13 pm

Bully was taken in by a senior dog rescue when he was 21, and he’s still going strong, reaching an age few dogs ever see.

Happy birthday to this sweet old Chihuahua

Dogs unluckily don’t stay as lengthy as human beings do, however some are blessed with true lengthy lives. Once a canine reaches his senior years, each and every birthday is a milestone well worth celebrating.

 

Like one candy rescue dog, who lately became 23 — an super age in canine years — and acquired a very different birthday birthday party to celebrate.

Bully, a Chihuahua, has had a desirable lengthy life, however when he was once 21, he had a foremost existence change: his aged proprietor should no longer care for him, and he used to be taken in through the senior canine rescue The Mr. Mo Project, in accordance to The Dodo.

It can be challenging for a canine to discover himself in new environment at such an historic age. Bully — additionally recognised as Bobo — is a “super senior” in canine years: he’s now nicely previous the lifestyles expectancy of Chihuahuas.

Bully is now the rescue’s oldest resident — so when currently celebrated his terrific twenty third birthday, they made certain to have fun in style.

Chris Hughes began the Mr. Mo Project with his spouse Mariesa, and senior puppies have a very different vicinity in their hearts. They have been stimulated to begin the rescue after caring for a 12-year-old canine named Moses who had been surrendered for “being too old.”

The couple has reportedly spent over $55,000 turning their domestic into a sanctuary for senior dogs, all to make sure these often-overlooked senior pets have a safe, loving region to spent their twilight years.

“We each work full-time jobs outdoor of The Mr. Mo Project,” Chris informed Insider. “This is no longer a job, this is a labor of love. It’s the place all our cash goes toward.”

Oldest canine in rescue receives exclusive birthday celebration for his twenty third birthday — joyful birthday, Bully

Home » Oldest canine in rescue receives one of a kind birthday party for his twenty third birthday — pleased birthday, Bully
The Animal Club

April 18, 2022

Dogs lamentably don’t stay as lengthy as human beings do, however some are blessed with proper lengthy lives. Once a canine reaches his senior years, each birthday is a milestone really worth celebrating.

Like one candy rescue dog, who lately grew to become 23 — an gorgeous age in canine years — and obtained a very extraordinary birthday birthday party to celebrate.

Bully, a Chihuahua, has had a right lengthy life, however when he was once 21, he had a primary lifestyles change: his aged proprietor ought to no longer care for him, and he was once taken in by means of the senior canine rescue The Mr. Mo Project, in accordance to The Dodo.

It can be hard for a canine to discover himself in new environment at such an historic age. Bully — additionally recognized as Bobo — is a “super senior” in canine years: he’s now properly previous the existence expectancy of Chihuahuas.

But after two years in the rescue, Bully has adjusted to his new domestic and has persisted to thrive.

“Bully is feisty, naughty, sweet, independent, gentle, calm and he has an ancient man bark,” Chris Hughes, who runs the rescue, informed The Dodo. “Even at his age, he likes to attempt to push round every other one of our Chihuahuas.”

Bully is now the rescue’s oldest resident — so when lately celebrated his top notch twenty third birthday, they made certain to rejoice in style.

According to a Facebook post, Bully used to be born on April 5, 1999. He is one of the few puppies nonetheless alive who has lived via two millenniums. He’s reached an age few puppies should dream of.

While it’s an event worthwhile of a massive splash, this ancient canine desired a greater low-key celebration.

“He doesn’t have too many teeth, so we obtained a gentle biscuit and crumbled it up for him to enjoy,” Hughes said. “He without a doubt enjoys sleeping, so that’s the fantastic present to supply him.”

Chris Hughes began the Mr. Mo Project with his spouse Mariesa, and senior puppies have a very unique location in their hearts. They had been stimulated to begin the rescue after caring for a 12-year-old canine named Moses who had been surrendered for “being too old.”

The couple has reportedly spent over $55,000 turning their domestic into a sanctuary for senior dogs, all to make certain these often-overlooked senior pets have a safe, loving location to spent their twilight years.

“We each work full-time jobs outdoor of The Mr. Mo Project,” Chris informed Insider. “This is now not a job, this is a labor of love. It’s the place all our cash goes toward.”

“A lot of these puppies that come to us are in all likelihood not noted due to the fact of the way they look. They’ve obtained awful legs, horrific teeth, crusted eyes, they’re matted. But they have so an awful lot existence to live.”

They’ve viewed many senior puppies come and go over the years, and are continually positive to have a good time their dogs’ huge lifestyles milestones.

“We strive to have a good time all the excellent matters that manifest in our domestic due to the fact so frequently there are not-so-great matters that happen,” Chris instructed The Dodo. “We have a good time when puppies end chemo treatments, birthdays, adoptions and have been regarded to have Christmas in July if we assume anyone won’t make it till Christmas.”

And Bully’s large twenty third birthday was once without a doubt one of the most exceptional occasions

Happy birthday, Bully! What an gorgeous fulfillment to stay to 23 — wishing you even extra comfortable years ahead!

The post Oldest dog in rescue gets special party for his 23rd birthday — happy birthday, Bully appeared first on News.

item.title: The Man Gave Baby Elephant CPR To Save Its Life After A “Motorcycle Accident”!
item.dc:creator: simra
item.description:
AuthorPOSTED BYadmin PUBLISHEDJanuary 24, 20233:19 pm UPDATED6:08 pm Thankful  Bless it’s heart and the kind person...

The post The Man Gave Baby Elephant CPR To Save Its Life After A “Motorcycle Accident”! appeared first on News.
item.content:encoded:
• AuthorPOSTED BYadmin
  • PUBLISHEDJanuary 24, 20233:19 pm
  • UPDATED6:08 pm

Thankful  Bless it’s heart and the kind person that saved its life. 

You’ve probably seen a lot of emergency services for people, but you’ve probably never seen an animal being rescued, and this man also couldn’t believe he gave CPR to an elephant.
That is so wonderful to know and so pleased that baby Ellie was saved. Thank you so much for what you did!

A motorbike [stru.ck] a baby elephant as it crossed a road with a herd of wild elephants in Chanthaburi province, eastern Thailand. Mana Srivate, a local lifeguard, rushed to the scene as soon as people called for assistance.

He is perplexed that his first aid subject is an elephant; in his 26-year career, he has performed dozens of CPR, but never on an elephant.

 

 

He was, however, professional and quick to tre.at the strangest pa.tient he had ever encountered. It was instinct, but I was nervous the whole time because I could hear the mother and other elephants calling her baby.

Srivate attempted to give the po.or creature a heart massage while colleagues a few meters away tre.ated the motorcyclist and were left stu.nned. Srivate doesn’t even know where the elephant’s heart is, so he relies on human theory and a video clip he saw online to save the baby elephant.

Not only that, but rescuers are under even more pressure because the rest of the elephants are not far away and could arrive at any time. The baby elephant miraculously revived after a dra.matic ten-minute period. Fortunately, the motorcyclist was not se.rio.usly hu.rt.

Srivate almost cri.ed when the baby elephant began to move. That is truly amazing!
After 10 minutes, the elephant slowly stood up and was loaded onto a truck and transported to another location for tre.atment before being returned to the original location to be reunited with its herd.

This was the first time Mana provided first aid to an elephant, and he was overjoyed when the baby elephant was saved. Many people have admired his quick wits; we can’t imagine the disaster if Mana does not arrive on time.

God bless Mana and the baby elephant!

So happy this baby is alive. Good on you for doing that, very kind hearted person you are well done! Thank you for saving that sweet baby.
GOD BLESS YOU BOTH! 

Great Job Saving a Baby Elephant! First Time For the Rescue Worker to Do CPR on an Animal. He Figured The Elephants Heart Would be in the Same Area, as a Human’s Heart. Bless You For Your Love & Caring! 

 

Please share this post with your friends!

The post The Man Gave Baby Elephant CPR To Save Its Life After A “Motorcycle Accident”! appeared first on News.

item.title: Delicate Rescue Operation In A Cave For A Dog Lost For Almost 2 Months
item.dc:creator: simra
item.description:
AuthorPOSTED BYadmin PUBLISHEDJanuary 24, 20233:31 pm UPDATED6:14 pm  A dog that had been missing for...

The post Delicate Rescue Operation In A Cave For A Dog Lost For Almost 2 Months appeared first on News.
item.content:encoded:
• AuthorPOSTED BYadmin
  • PUBLISHEDJanuary 24, 20233:31 pm
  • UPDATED6:14 pm

 A dog that had been missing for two months was rescued by a team of speleologists. Due to the layout of the building, their objective was especially challenging, as reported by positive-info.

Almost two months after disappearing on June 9, a dog named Abby was discovered and saved by cave divers on August 6.

When hunting for Abby, how did her family not notice that she had wandered off and ended up in a cave? Only she can provide a definitive response to this inquiry. Even though she had access to water and freshwater fish and crustaceans, it is unknown how she survived in this unfriendly and entirely dark habitat.

However, experts immediately went into action to save the puppy after learning that she had been seen in the Tom Moore subterranean tunnels between Brewer and Perryville in Missouri. The crew of cavers included Rick Haley and Gerry Keene. They went straight into the 35 km long maze. They eventually tracked down the animal, but freeing it was no easy task.

They squished Abby into a 60-centimeter opening, then climbed the rock face 150 meters upward to the surface.

Robert Cahoon, deputy chief of the Biehle fire brigade, helped them outside. Between the two of them, they canvassed the area looking for the dog’s owners. Once they found the correct address, they were able to enter. Abby’s owners, who had given up hope that they would ever see their dog alive again after so much time had passed since she had vanished, were shocked. Back at home, the dog is taking it easy as she recovers from her ordeal.

Please share this post with your friends!

The post Delicate Rescue Operation In A Cave For A Dog Lost For Almost 2 Months appeared first on News.

item.title: Orphaned Elephants Sympathize With A Baby Elephant That Recently Lost Mother!
item.dc:creator: simra
item.description:
AuthorPOSTED BYadmin PUBLISHEDJanuary 24, 20233:14 pm UPDATED6:06 pm Elephants are very loving, family oriented, compassionate...

The post Orphaned Elephants Sympathize With A Baby Elephant That Recently Lost Mother! appeared first on News.
item.content:encoded:
• AuthorPOSTED BYadmin
  • PUBLISHEDJanuary 24, 20233:14 pm
  • UPDATED6:06 pm

Elephants are very loving, family oriented, compassionate animals who feel deeply!

They are so family oriented taking care of the little one who lo.st his Mother.
HOW PRECIOUS!! ANIMALS have more COMPASSION than most HUMANS! 

Many people’s hearts were br.o.ken when the orp.haned baby elephants shared their gri.ef and comforted another baby elephant who has just [lo.st] his mother.
The emotional moment occurred in 2018, when a crew from the “David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust (DSWT)”, an elephant orp.hanage, was in the area on a routine patrol when they noticed the stranger sign. A young’s lone tracks in the sand along the Tiva River.

 

 

They quickly discovered an [exh.aus.ted] baby elephant cr.ying for its mother. Unfortunately, his mother di.ed a long time ago, and he was rescued by these good people.

The orp.haned Mukkoka is a one-year-old elephant who was me.dically checked, properly fed with the orp.hanage’s miracle milk formula, and miraculously recovered within a few days.

However, for an orp.haned elephant, life was nothing but difficult, so the volunteers decided to introduce Mukkoka to the new family. And the other elephants surrounded him with care and concern as soon as he met his new herd as if they could sense his sa.dness.

They enveloped him and led him out into the woods to meet the other of the herd. The other infants gave him a warm welcome, extending out their trunks to reassure and accept Mukkoka as a new member of the family.

This image shows once again these creatures are special beyond human imagination. They have a great deal of compassion and empathy for others.

Mukkoka will most likely spend the next ten years in the care of the DSWT before being released back into the wild. Until then, he’ll heal and learn how to be an elephant, with help from his loving foster family every step of the way.

The baby elephant is now a member of a new family, and it will never be left behind, that’s for sure!

So sorry about the baby who lo.st his mom  but grateful for the other Elephants who gave him so much love
The human race could and should learn what Empathy is from what these wonderful Noble Animals are !!

They are the most beautiful animals inside and out.
Such gentle loving creatures! 

Please share this post with your friends!

The post Orphaned Elephants Sympathize With A Baby Elephant That Recently Lost Mother! appeared first on News.

item.title: Orphaned Polar Bear Cub Loves Hugging Arctic Workers Who Saved Her Life
item.dc:creator: simra
item.description:
AuthorPOSTED BYadmin PUBLISHEDJanuary 24, 20233:16 pm UPDATED6:07 pm This is the tale of an orphaned...

The post Orphaned Polar Bear Cub Loves Hugging Arctic Workers Who Saved Her Life appeared first on News.
item.content:encoded:
• AuthorPOSTED BYadmin
  • PUBLISHEDJanuary 24, 20233:16 pm
  • UPDATED6:07 pm

This is the tale of an orphaned polar bear who was rescued from the verge of fatality by gold miners in the Arctic.

The cub was entrusted to fend for herself after her mommy passed away while on a remote Russian island, this triggered her to come close to the gold mine and beg to be fed.

In spite of their being policies prohibiting the feeding of polar bears, the miners decided that saving her life was more crucial.

Therefore, they all cared for her throughout several months, unfortunately, though, this implied she became tamed like a dog.

As she no relied on the miners for her food, the polar bear cub lost the capacity to hunt for itself.

In the footage below, you can see the cub climbing up a ladder prior to jumping to adoringly hug among the miners.

” The women cub invested numerous months living near to humans, as well as obtained so used to them that it behaved like a canine,” stated a neighborhood record.

Ultimately, the gold miners’ contract finished as well as they returned back to the mainland, but not before making certain the polar bear cub was looked after.

Andrey Gorban, 56, supervisor of Royev Ruchei Zoo in Krasnoyarsk, who supervised of the rescue said: “The workers could just connect with us at the end of their work stint, as they had no communication web link at the base.”

“We were informed that the men were leaving back to the landmass, and also the cub had stayed there alone.”

” Our only hope was that they left rather a large open rubbish site, so there was a possibility that the cub could feed off it for weeks.”

With help from the Moscow Zoo, a mission was released to save the tame bear by taking it to the Moscow Zoo.

The bear was discovered on the miners’ website plainly pining for its missing pals and was required to the Zoo where a decision will certainly be made on where to residence it.

The bear can not return to the wild as she is too reliant on human beings and would certainly not survive on her own.

In spite of breaking the regulations pertaining to feeding the polar bear, Andrey Gorban applauded the miners for conserving the shed as well as helpless cub.

“For appropriate or wrong, they fed the jeopardized animal and also through that tamed it,’ he stated.”

” The shift workers conserved its life, the cub had no chance to survive.”

The post Orphaned Polar Bear Cub Loves Hugging Arctic Workers Who Saved Her Life appeared first on News.

item.title: Too cute mom gave birth to too cute babies. [Netherland Dwarf]
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
I remember I had a rabbit as my pet, and I named it Ichigo. He...

The post Too cute mom gave birth to too cute babies. [Netherland Dwarf] appeared first on News.
item.content:encoded:
I remember I had a rabbit as my pet, and I named it Ichigo. He lives for 7 years with me. He ate basically almost everything except meat. Any vegetables, rice, even some cakes, he ate it deliciously. He is my best friend, and even almost 10 years ago since he dies, I still missing him and I can’t bring myself to adopt any pet. He is the best fluffy friend I ever had

The post Too cute mom gave birth to too cute babies. [Netherland Dwarf] appeared first on News.
